metadata.name: The cutman
metadata.description:
My friend Ryad Merhy, the boxing champion from my eponymous collection, has signed a contract for his next big challenge, a world championship final on 29 may (rescheduled) in Johannesburg, South Africa. As a photographer and avid supporter of his career, I've always found a way to fund these trip to capture his performances. Unfortunately, the budget for the trip is not available this time.

I am passionate about capturing the moments behind the scenes of the fight and at the ringside. I love making this trip a reality. I found a creative way to fund my expenses by launching a sort of crowdfunding campaign with NFT.  
 After a first round with "Fly me to the moon" we moved forward and I reached more than 50% of the budget I need to finance the story.  
Here is round 2, the final round. 
"The cutman"  offering a limited run of 50 editions at 0.015 ETH each.  
The goal is 0.75 ETH to cover my expenses. 
In addition, I'm offering a 50% discount on 1/1 NFTs I sell on Fondation.

This project not only combines the world of Web3 with the real story of a photographer's journey, my journey in the blockchain and IRL, but it also offers a unique opportunity for owners to support and be a part of the journey.

So will you help me fly to the moon?
